root.message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 15-5-1, translated into en
root.data: See above and below, and full documentation in the Red List Rules of Procedure (https://www.iucnredlist.org/resources/rules-of-procedure) in particular Annex 3, the “Details of the Steps Involved in the IUCN Red List Process” (https://cmsdocs.s3.amazonaws.com/keydocuments/Details_of_the_Steps_Involved_in_the_IUCN_Red_List_Process.pdf).
